root.name: The Adventures of Elmo in Grouchland
root.description: OverviewElmo's Blanket gets blown away by the wind and ends up inside Oscar's can and subsequently transported to Grouchland USA.Hidden TextInside the source code, Roger Amidon left a secret message below (the phone number is starred out for privacy, but it is fully available in the code):See if you can retrieve them from this ROM. If you do, you win the prize. Please.. call (***) ***-**** (in New Jersey, USA) if you have been able to view the two .GIF pictures, located in the rest of the upper 6 Megs of this ROM. We will have a nice reward..for you…….Good Luck!….Roger W. Amidon..The phone number is still active of this writing and does indeed lead to Roger W. Amidon. He claims to have no idea what he was thinking of as the prize. The .GIF pictures are of Roger and his two sons.
